operations.summary: Returns a list of all SCIM Resource Type objects

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: SCIM filter

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Specifies a property value by which to sort

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Specifies either ascending or descending alphabetical order

parameters.name: startIndex
parameters.description: 1-based index of the first result to return

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Indicates the number of results per page

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

parameters.name: excludeAttributes
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of attributes to exclude from the response

responseMessages.message: The requested operation succeeded
The requested operation succeeded and no further information has been provided, such as in the case of a DELETE operation.
The request contents are incorrectly formatted or the request was made for an invalid API version.
The requester cannot be authenticated
The requester does not have the required privileges or another constraint failed, such as attempting to delete an edit-only object.
The requested path does not refer to an existing object or object relation.

The requested operation could not be performed due to the current state of the configuration. For example, an attempt was made to create an object that already exists or an attempt was made to delete an object that is referred to by another object.
The request is such that the Accept header does not indicate that JSON is an acceptable format for a response.
The server encountered an unexpected error.

add-scim-resource-type-request.description: A SCIM Resource Type resource request

typeName.description: Name of the new SCIM Resource Type

includeOperationalAttribute.description: Specifies the set of operational LDAP attributes to be provided by this SCIM Resource Type.

description.description: A description for this SCIM Resource Type

auxiliaryLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies an auxiliary LDAP object class that should be exposed by this SCIM Resource Type.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the SCIM Resource Type is enabled.

endpoint.description: The HTTP addressable endpoint of this SCIM Resource Type relative to the '/scim/v2' base URL. Do not include a leading '/'.

schemaCheckingOption.description: Options to alter the way schema checking is performed during create or modify requests.

structuralLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies the LDAP structural object class that should be exposed by this SCIM Resource Type.

lookthroughLimit.description: The maximum number of resources that the SCIM Resource Type should
in the course of processing a search request.

coreSchema.description: The core schema enforced on core attributes at the top level of a SCIM resource representation exposed by thisMapping SCIM Resource Type.

requiredSchemaExtension.description: Required additive schemas that are enforced on extension attributes in a SCIM resource representation for this Mapping SCIM Resource Type.

optionalSchemaExtension.description: Optional additive schemas that are enforced on extension attributes in a SCIM resource representation for this Mapping SCIM Resource Type.

includeBaseDN.description: Specifies the base DN of the branch of the LDAP directory that can be accessed by this SCIM Resource Type.

includeFilter.description: The set of LDAP filters that define the LDAP entries that should be included in this SCIM Resource Type.

createDNPattern.description: Specifies the template to use for the DN when creating new entries.

scim-resource-type-response.description: A SCIM Resource Type resource response

id.description: Name of the SCIM Resource Type

includeOperationalAttribute.description: Specifies the set of operational LDAP attributes to be provided by this SCIM Resource Type.

description.description: A description for this SCIM Resource Type

auxiliaryLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies an auxiliary LDAP object class that should be exposed by this SCIM Resource Type.

enabled.description: Indicates whether the SCIM Resource Type is enabled.

endpoint.description: The HTTP addressable endpoint of this SCIM Resource Type relative to the '/scim/v2' base URL. Do not include a leading '/'.

schemaCheckingOption.description: Options to alter the way schema checking is performed during create or modify requests.

structuralLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies the LDAP structural object class that should be exposed by this SCIM Resource Type.

lookthroughLimit.description: The maximum number of resources that the SCIM Resource Type should
in the course of processing a search request.

coreSchema.description: The core schema enforced on core attributes at the top level of a SCIM resource representation exposed by thisMapping SCIM Resource Type.

requiredSchemaExtension.description: Required additive schemas that are enforced on extension attributes in a SCIM resource representation for this Mapping SCIM Resource Type.

optionalSchemaExtension.description: Optional additive schemas that are enforced on extension attributes in a SCIM resource representation for this Mapping SCIM Resource Type.

includeBaseDN.description: Specifies the base DN of the branch of the LDAP directory that can be accessed by this SCIM Resource Type.

includeFilter.description: The set of LDAP filters that define the LDAP entries that should be included in this SCIM Resource Type.

createDNPattern.description: Specifies the template to use for the DN when creating new entries.

correlated-ldap-data-view-list-response.description: Correlated LDAP Data View list response

add-correlated-ldap-data-view-request.description: A Correlated LDAP Data View resource request

viewName.description: Name of the new Correlated LDAP Data View

includeOperationalAttribute.description: Specifies the set of operational LDAP attributes to be provided by this Correlated LDAP Data View.

structuralLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies the LDAP structural object class that should be exposed by this Correlated LDAP Data View.

secondaryCorrelationAttribute.description: The LDAP attribute from the Correlated LDAP Data View whose value will be matched with the primary-correlation-attribute. If multiple correlation attributes are required they may be specified by creating additional correlation-attribute-pairs.

auxiliaryLDAPObjectclass.description: Specifies an auxiliary LDAP object class that should be exposed by this Correlated LDAP Data View.

primaryCorrelationAttribute.description: The LDAP attribute from the parent SCIM Resource Type whose value will be used to match objects in the Correlated LDAP Data View. If multiple correlation attributes are required they may be created using additional correlation-attribute-pairs.

includeBaseDN.description: Specifies the base DN of the branch of the LDAP directory that can be accessed by this Correlated LDAP Data View.

includeFilter.description: The set of LDAP filters that define the LDAP entries that should be included in this Correlated LDAP Data View.

createDNPattern.description: Specifies the template to use for the DN when creating new entries.

add-scim-attribute-mapping-request.description: A SCIM Attribute Mapping resource request

mappingName.description: Name of the new SCIM Attribute Mapping

readable.description: Specifies whether the mapping is used to map from LDAP attribute to SCIM Resource Type attribute in a read operation.

scimResourceTypeAttribute.description: The attribute path of SCIM Resource Type attributes to be mapped.

authoritative.description: Specifies that the mapping is authoritative over other mappings for the same SCIM Resource Type attribute (for read operations).

ldapAttribute.description: The LDAP attribute to be mapped, or the path to a specific field of an LDAP attribute with the JSON object attribute syntax.

correlatedLDAPDataView.description: The Correlated LDAP Data View that persists the mapped SCIM Resource Type attribute(s).

searchable.description: Specifies that the mapping is used to map from SCIM Resource Type attribute to LDAP attribute in a search filter.

writable.description: Specifies that the mapping is used to map from SCIM Resource Type attribute to LDAP attribute in a write operation.

scim-attribute-mapping-response.description: A SCIM Attribute Mapping resource response
